page.title: 14 HOUSING
page.content: We found a mixture of housing in our area. In Kingstanding there are many council houses built in the 1930s to accomodate families from overcrowded inner city areas. Some of these are now owner occupied. In Great Barr most houses are semi-detached and owner-occupied. In the Walsall area of Sandwell most roads are full of semi-detached houses but a few have large detached houses. One is for sale in Pages Lane for Â£72,500. It has 5 bedrooms, a through lounge, a dining room, a fully fitted kitchen, bathroom, side garage and a front and back garden. A nearby semi in Scott Road is for sale at Â£24,500. It has 3 bedrooms, a lounge and dining room, kitchen and bathroom, plus a back garden. Both houses have central heating.
